Dataset column information:

A (fixed) shows the amount of fixed acidity present in the wine
A (volatile) shows the amount of volatile acidity present in the wine
citric acid shows the amount of citric acid, in grams per litre, present in the wine
RS shows the amount of residual (left over) sugar present in the wine, also in grams per litre
chlorides shows the amount of chlorides, in parts per million, present in the wine
Free and Total SO2 show the quantities of sulfur dioxide present in the wine
density shows how dense the wine is
pH shows how acidic the wine is according to the pH scale
sulphates shows how many grams per litre of sulphates there are in the wine
alcohol shows the alcohol by volume of the wine as a percentage
quality shows the rated quality of the wine, with 9 as highest and 0 as lowest
